if-statement-code-intro_key2: We have learned how to create flowcharts for if conditions. But we cannot use these flowcharts unless we learn how to write a code by looking at a flowchart.
if-statement-code-intro_key3: In the above example, we take the day as input from the user. According to the day entered, we print the food item for that particular day. Read the comments carefully to understand how the code is executed at every step.
if-statement-code-intro_key5: While entering the input for the day, you'll have to enter it exactly as it is used in the if conditions. Since Python is case-sensitive, it will treat Monday and monday differently.
if-statement-code-intro_key7: We have only used ==, comparison operator in the if statements. In the booleans exercise, we had seen other comparison operators as well. For example:
if-statement-code-intro_key8: > : Greater than
if-statement-code-intro_key9: < : Less than
if-statement-code-intro_key10: >= : Greater than equal to
if-statement-code-intro_key11: <= : Less than equal to
if-statement-code-intro_key12: != : Not equal to
if-statement-code-intro_key13: The following examples use these above mentioned comparison operators.
if-statement-code-intro_key15: In this program, you have set the value of the variable. The user will have to guess the string.
if-statement-code-intro_key17: Let's assume a rule that if the speed of our vehicle is less than or equal to 60, it will not be considered as overspeeding. Otherwise, it will be considered as overspeeding. We can write the program for it as shown below:
if-statement-code-intro_key19: Notice we have converted the value in the speed variable to an int before using in if condition. This is because the output of the input function is always a string and we cannot compare a string with a number correctly using <= operator.
if-statement-code-intro_key20: Nested If Condition
if-statement-code-intro_key21: We can easily use an if statement inside another if statement.
if-statement-code-intro_key22: Consider the example where we want to display the food menu based on the day and time. if-statement-code-intro_key24: Observe how we have used if statement inside another if statement. The if statement inside will only be checked if the outer if condition is True.
